hero.subtitle: The World's First Realistic QA Workspace
hero.description: Immerse yourself in a complete, true-to-life QA environment. Gain real work experience that surpasses traditional internships or entry-level positions.
hero.searchPlaceholder: What do you want to learn in QA?

tooltips.slack: Streamline team communication and integrate with QA tools for real-time notifications and collaborative problem-solving.
tooltips.jira: Manage QA workflows, track bugs, and collaborate on test cases using industry-standard project management tools.
tooltips.xray: Enhance test management within Jira, enabling comprehensive test planning, execution, and reporting.
tooltips.mysql: Learn database testing techniques and SQL querying for comprehensive backend quality assurance.
tooltips.postman: Master API testing and automation to ensure robust backend functionality and integration.
tooltips.vscode: Utilize a powerful IDE for writing and managing test scripts, enhancing your coding skills in QA automation.
tooltips.github: Practice version control, collaborate on test code, and integrate with CI/CD pipelines for efficient QA processes.

sandbox.title: UPEX Sandbox
sandbox.description: Free Jira workspace for hands-on QA practice. Perfect for beginners to experience real testing scenarios.

blackhole.title: UPEX Blackhole
blackhole.description: Comprehensive online courses covering fundamental to advanced QA skills for aspiring testers.

galaxy.title: UPEX Galaxy
galaxy.description: Our flagship product: An immersive, realistic QA workspace that simulates and surpasses real-world environments.

satellite.title: UPEX Satellite (New)
satellite.description: Connecting skilled UPEX graduates with software companies seeking qualified QA talent. (Coming Soon)

items.realistic: Complete, realistic QA workspace with hands-on experience - unmatched in the industry.
items.community: Join a community of like-minded testers and professionals
items.true-to-life: True-to-life work experience surpassing entry-level positions
items.integrated: Integration of industry-standard tools: Jira, XRay, GitHub, CI pipelines
items.structured: Structured environment promoting QA best practices
items.educational: Bridge the gap between education and professional work

community.title: Join the UPEX Community
community.description: Connect with fellow QA professionals, share knowledge, and stay updated with the latest in software testing.

footer.description: Experience the future of QA with our revolutionary Galaxy workspace
